heading: Sammy Wilson Nude Again
body: Sammy Wilson naked, tired and in pain, was how I pictured him in my mind's eye. I was standing on one leg, sword in the air, occasionally rubbing my bottom to encourage him on and telling him to "show me the rest of you, love!" I was just waiting for a cue from Sam to go for the sword when Sam screamed out and I knew it was over. He never screamed when we sparred, his screams usually happened during the role play, I had never heard him scream before. That afternoon was the last time I ever saw Sammy Wilson.
